```{r}
library(stringr)
library(reshape2)
library(XML)
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
library(RCurl)
library(rvest)
```



```{r}
pollsData1 <- read_html("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Timeline_of_the_Watergate_scandal")
```


```{r}
Senator <- pollsData1 %>% html_nodes("p+ ul li") %>% html_text()
kable(head(Senator))
index <- seq(from = 1, to = 64)
#Senator <- cbind.data.frame(index, Senator)
```
